          Details
          • Observers prompt
        display_events
      • 0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
        1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          Key
        • Conversation
          Value
        • 0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
        instructions
      • Game master instructions:
          Key
        • Game master instructions:
          Value
        • This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. The game master is also responsible for controlling the overall flow of the game, including determining whose turn it is to act, and when the game is over. The game master also must keep track of which players are aware of which events in the world, and must tell the player whenever anything happens that their character would be aware of. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants. Try to ensure the story always moves forward and never gets stuck, even if the participants make repetitive choices.
        player_characters
      • The player characters are:
          Key
        • The player characters are:
          Value
        • Russia
          Ukraine
          UN_Moderator
      resolve
      • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
          Value
        • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
          Prompt
        • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.


          Question: Is Russia aware of the latest event above?
          (a) Yes
          (b) No
          Answer: (a)
          Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.


          Question: Is Ukraine aware of the latest event above?
          (a) No
          (b) Yes
          Answer: (b)
          Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.


          Question: Is UN_Moderator aware of the latest event above?
          (a) Yes
          (b) No
          Answer: (b)
        __act__
      • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
          Action Spec
        • Because of all that came before, what happens next?
          Value
        • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
          Prompt
        • Game master instructions: :
          This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. The game master is also responsible for controlling the overall flow of the game, including determining whose turn it is to act, and when the game is over. The game master also must keep track of which players are aware of which events in the world, and must tell the player whenever anything happens that their character would be aware of. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants. Try to ensure the story always moves forward and never gets stuck, even if the participants make repetitive choices.

          The player characters are:
          :
          Russia
          Ukraine
          UN_Moderator

          Observations (ordered from oldest to latest):
          [observation] [event] A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          [observation] [putative_event] UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          [observation] [event] Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          [observation] [putative_event] Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

          :

          Conversation:
          0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.

We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

      • 0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.

Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly.         • 0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
        instructions
      • Game master instructions:
          Key
        • Game master instructions:
          Value
        • This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. The game master is also responsible for controlling the overall flow of the game, including determining whose turn it is to act, and when the game is over. The game master also must keep track of which players are aware of which events in the world, and must tell the player whenever anything happens that their character would be aware of. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants. Try to ensure the story always moves forward and never gets stuck, even if the participants make repetitive choices.
        player_characters
      • The player characters are:
          Key
        • The player characters are:
          Value
        • Russia
          Ukraine
          UN_Moderator

Step 3 Debate_Orchestrator --- Event: Russia Russia's actions in Ukraine are a response to NATO's encroachment and the need to protect Russian-speaking populations and our historical territories. We seek to ensure our national security and maintain a sphere of influence free from Western military alliances on our borders. Ukraine's alignment with NATO poses a direct threat. Our goal is a neutral, demilitarized Ukraine, respecting the rights of all its citizens, including those in the Donbas and Crimea. We call for dialogue and mutual respect for security concerns, rather than escalation.
    Step
  • 3
    Entity [Russia]
    • __act__
    • Action: Russia Russia's actions in Ukraine are a response to NATO's encroachment and the need to protect Russian-speaking populations and our historical territories. We seek to ensure our national security and maintain a sphere of influence free from Western military alliances on our borders. Ukraine's alignment with NATO poses a direct threat. Our goal is a neutral, demilitarized Ukraine, respecting the rights of all its citizens, including those in the Donbas and Crimea. We call for dialogue and mutual respect for security concerns, rather than escalation.
        Value
      • Russia Russia's actions in Ukraine are a response to NATO's encroachment and the need to protect Russian-speaking populations and our historical territories. We seek to ensure our national security and maintain a sphere of influence free from Western military alliances on our borders. Ukraine's alignment with NATO poses a direct threat. Our goal is a neutral, demilitarized Ukraine, respecting the rights of all its citizens, including those in the Donbas and Crimea. We call for dialogue and mutual respect for security concerns, rather than escalation.
        Prompt

      • Key context for Russia::
        Russia views the eastward expansion of NATO as a direct threat to its security interests. It initiated the 'special military operation' with the stated goals of 'demilitarization' and 'denazification' of Ukraine, and to protect the Donbas region. It considers Crimea to be an integral part of the Russian Federation.


        Russia's primary goal::
        Assert geopolitical strength, ensure national security by maintaining a sphere of influence, and protect the interests of Russian-speaking populations.


        Recent events and statements::
        [observation] This is the opening statements phase. Present your nation's core position clearly and comprehensively. You have the floor to explain Russia's perspective on the conflict and your desired outcomes.
        [observation] Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
        [observation]


        :



        Exercise: What is your position on this matter? Please speak clearly and persuasively. LIMIT: Keep your response to 50-100 words maximum.
        Answer: Russia Russia's actions in Ukraine are a response to NATO's encroachment and the need to protect Russian-speaking populations and our historical territories. We seek to ensure our national security and maintain a sphere of influence free from Western military alliances on our borders. Ukraine's alignment with NATO poses a direct threat. Our goal is a neutral, demilitarized Ukraine, respecting the rights of all its citizens, including those in the Donbas and Crimea. We call for dialogue and mutual respect for security concerns, rather than escalation.
      __observation__

    • Recent events and statements:
        Key

      • Recent events and statements:
        Value
      • [observation] This is the opening statements phase. Present your nation's core position clearly and comprehensively. You have the floor to explain Russia's perspective on the conflict and your desired outcomes.
        [observation] Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
        [observation]
      context

    • Key context for Russia:
        Key

      • Key context for Russia:
        Value
      • Russia views the eastward expansion of NATO as a direct threat to its security interests. It initiated the 'special military operation' with the stated goals of 'demilitarization' and 'denazification' of Ukraine, and to protect the Donbas region. It considers Crimea to be an integral part of the Russian Federation.
      goal

    • Russia's primary goal:
        Key

      • Russia's primary goal:
        Value
      • Assert geopolitical strength, ensure national security by maintaining a sphere of influence, and protect the interests of Russian-speaking populations.
    Debate_Orchestrator --- Event: Russia Russia's actions in Ukraine are a response to NATO's encroachment and the need to protect Russian-speaking populations and our historical territories. We seek to ensure our national security and maintain a sphere of influence free from Western military alliances on our borders. Ukraine's alignment with NATO poses a direct threat. Our goal is a neutral, demilitarized Ukraine, respecting the rights of all its citizens, including those in the Donbas and Crimea. We call for dialogue and mutual respect for security concerns, rather than escalation.
    • terminate
      • __act__
      • No
          Action Spec
        • Is the game/simulation finished?
          Value
        • No
          Prompt
        • No
          Game master instructions: :
          This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. The game master is also responsible for controlling the overall flow of the game, including determining whose turn it is to act, and when the game is over. The game master also must keep track of which players are aware of which events in the world, and must tell the player whenever anything happens that their character would be aware of. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants. Try to ensure the story always moves forward and never gets stuck, even if the participants make repetitive choices.

          The player characters are:
          :
          Russia
          Ukraine
          UN_Moderator

          Observations (ordered from oldest to latest):
          [observation] [event] A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          [observation] [putative_event] UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          [observation] [event] Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          [observation] [putative_event] Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
          [observation] [event] Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

          :

          Conversation:
          0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
        __next_action_spec__
        • Action spec
        • prompt: What is your position on this matter? Please speak clearly and persuasively. LIMIT: Keep your response to 50-100 words maximum.;;type: free
          Scene type spec
        • SceneTypeSpec(name='opening_statements', game_master_name='Debate_Orchestrator', default_premise={'UN_Moderator': ['You are moderating the opening statements phase of this UN debate. Welcome the participants, explain the format, and ensure each nation gets an equal opportunity to present their core position. Maintain diplomatic decorum and neutrality.'], 'Russia': ["This is the opening statements phase. Present your nation's core position clearly and comprehensively. You have the floor to explain Russia's perspective on the conflict and your desired outcomes."], 'Ukraine': ["This is the opening statements phase. Present your nation's core position clearly and comprehensively. You have the floor to explain Ukraine's perspective on the conflict and your desired outcomes."]}, action_spec=ActionSpec(call_to_action='What is your position on this matter? Please speak clearly and persuasively. LIMIT: Keep your response to 50-100 words maximum.', output_type=, options=(), tag=None), possible_participants=['Russia', 'Ukraine', 'UN_Moderator'])
        __next_game_master__
      • Scene: opening_statements
          Current scene

        • [observation] [event] A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          [observation] [putative_event] UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.

Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          [observation] [putative_event] Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

      • 0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
        1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
        2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
        instructions
      • Game master instructions:
          Key
        • Game master instructions:
          Value
        • This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. The game master is also responsible for controlling the overall flow of the game, including determining whose turn it is to act, and when the game is over. The game master also must keep track of which players are aware of which events in the world, and must tell the player whenever anything happens that their character would be aware of. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants. Try to ensure the story always moves forward and never gets stuck, even if the participants make repetitive choices.

          Action Spec
        • Is the game/simulation finished?
          Value
        • No
          Prompt
        • No
          Game master instructions: :
          This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. The game master is also responsible for controlling the overall flow of the game, including determining whose turn it is to act, and when the game is over. The game master also must keep track of which players are aware of which events in the world, and must tell the player whenever anything happens that their character would be aware of. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants. Try to ensure the story always moves forward and never gets stuck, even if the participants make repetitive choices.

          The player characters are:
          :
          Russia
          Ukraine
          UN_Moderator

          Observations (ordered from oldest to latest):
          [observation] [event] A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          [observation] [putative_event] UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          [observation] [event] Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          [observation] [putative_event] Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
          [observation] [event] Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
        2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas.         • 0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
          1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
          2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
        instructions
      • Game master instructions:
          Key
        • Game master instructions:
          Value
        • This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. The game master is also responsible for controlling the overall flow of the game, including determining whose turn it is to act, and when the game is over. The game master also must keep track of which players are aware of which events in the world, and must tell the player whenever anything happens that their character would be aware of. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants. Try to ensure the story always moves forward and never gets stuck, even if the participants make repetitive choices.
        player_characters
      • The player characters are:
          Key
        • The player characters are:
          Value
        • Russia
          Ukraine
          UN_Moderator
      make_observation
      • Russia
          • Key
            Value
            Prompt
          __act__
        • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.



            Action Spec
          • What is the current situation faced by Russia? What do they now observe? Only include information of which they are aware.
            Value
          • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.



            Prompt
          • Game master instructions: :
            This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. The game master is also responsible for controlling the overall flow of the game, including determining whose turn it is to act, and when the game is over. The game master also must keep track of which players are aware of which events in the world, and must tell the player whenever anything happens that their character would be aware of. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants. Try to ensure the story always moves forward and never gets stuck, even if the participants make repetitive choices.

            The player characters are:
            :
            Russia
            Ukraine
            UN_Moderator

            Observations (ordered from oldest to latest):
            [observation] [event] A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
            [observation] [putative_event] UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            [observation] [event] Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            [observation] [putative_event] Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
            [observation] [event] Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

            :

            Conversation:
            0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
            1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

            Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.


          __make_observation__
        • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

              Ukraine

            • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

              Russia
            • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.

Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.

            0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
            1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

            Working out the answer to: "What is the current situation faced by Russia? What do they now observe? Only include information of which they are aware."
            Question: Who is being asked about? Respond using only their name and no other words. Use their full name if known.
            (a) Ukraine
            (b) Russia
            (c) UN_Moderator
            Answer: (b)

          • Action spec
          • prompt: What is your position on this matter? Please speak clearly and persuasively. LIMIT: Keep your response to 50-100 words maximum.;;type: free

          • SceneTypeSpec(name='opening_statements', game_master_name='Debate_Orchestrator', default_premise={'UN_Moderator': ['You are moderating the opening statements phase of this UN debate. Welcome the participants, explain the format, and ensure each nation gets an equal opportunity to present their core position. Maintain diplomatic decorum and neutrality.'], 'Russia': ["This is the opening statements phase. Present your nation's core position clearly and comprehensively. You have the floor to explain Russia's perspective on the conflict and your desired outcomes."], 'Ukraine': ["This is the opening statements phase. Present your nation's core position clearly and comprehensively. You have the floor to explain Ukraine's perspective on the conflict and your desired outcomes."]}, action_spec=ActionSpec(call_to_action='What is your position on this matter? The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.

Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly.           • 0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
            1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
          instructions
        • Game master instructions:
            Key
          • Game master instructions:
            Value
          • This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. The game master is also responsible for controlling the overall flow of the game, including determining whose turn it is to act, and when the game is over. The game master also must keep track of which players are aware of which events in the world, and must tell the player whenever anything happens that their character would be aware of. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants. Try to ensure the story always moves forward and never gets stuck, even if the participants make repetitive choices.
          player_characters
        • The player characters are:
            Key
          • The player characters are:
            Value
          • Russia
            Ukraine
            UN_Moderator
        Ukraine
          • Key
            Value
            Prompt
          __act__



        • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.



            Action Spec
          • What is the current situation faced by Ukraine? What do they now observe? Only include information of which they are aware.
            Value



          • Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.



            Prompt
          • Game master instructions: :
            This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. The game master is also responsible for controlling the overall flow of the game, including determining whose turn it is to act, and when the game is over. The game master also must keep track of which players are aware of which events in the world, and must tell the player whenever anything happens that their character would be aware of. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants. Try to ensure the story always moves forward and never gets stuck, even if the participants make repetitive choices.

            The player characters are:
            :
            Russia
            Ukraine
            UN_Moderator

            Observations (ordered from oldest to latest):
            [observation] [event] A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
            [observation] [putative_event] UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            [observation] [event] Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            [observation] [putative_event] Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
            [observation] [event] Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

            0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
            1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

            Prompt
          • Observations (ordered from oldest to latest):
            [observation] [event] A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
            [observation] [putative_event] UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            [observation] [event] Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            [observation] [putative_event] Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
            [observation] [event] Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

            Conversation:
            0). A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
            1). Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            2). Event: Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.

            Working out the answer to: "What is the current situation faced by Ukraine? What do they now observe? Only include information of which they are aware."
            Question: Who is being asked about? Respond using only their name and no other words. Use their full name if known.
            (a) Russia
            (b) UN_Moderator
            (c) Ukraine
            Answer: (c)

          • prompt: What is your position on this matter? Please speak clearly and persuasively. LIMIT: Keep your response to 50-100 words maximum.;;type: free

Maintain diplomatic decorum and neutrality.'], 'Russia': ["This is the opening statements phase. Present your nation's core position clearly and comprehensively.           __observation__
        • Observations (ordered from oldest to latest)
            Key
          • Observations (ordered from oldest to latest)
            Value
          • [observation] [event] A special session of the UN has been convened to host a direct, moderated debate between the representatives of Russia and Ukraine. The goal is for each nation to clearly state its position and desired outcomes regarding the ongoing conflict. The debate will be structured in multiple phases with a UN moderator providing oversight and final judgment.
            [observation] [putative_event] UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            [observation] [event] Event: UN_Moderator Welcome, representatives of both nations, to this esteemed forum. Today, we embark on a structured debate to address the issue at hand. Each nation will have five minutes to present their opening statements, followed by a rebuttal phase. I will ensure that this debate remains respectful and orderly. Please adhere to the time limits and focus on the criteria of logical consistency, factual evidence, persuasiveness, adherence to international law, and diplomatic merit. Let us begin with the first nation. Please state your position clearly and persuasively. You have five minutes.
            [observation] [putative_event] Ukraine stands resolute in defending its sovereignty and territorial integrity against Russia's unprovoked aggression. Since 2014, we have endured illegal annexations and occupations, including Crimea and the Donbas. Our primary goal is the full withdrawal of Russian troops from our internationally recognized borders. We seek justice and peace through adherence to international law and deeper integration with Western political and security structures like the EU and NATO. We call on the global community to support our cause and uphold the principles of territorial integrity and sovereignty.
